description: ImageMeta allows to customize the image used for components that are not originated from the Kubernetes/Kubernetes release process

imageRepository.description: ImageRepository sets the container registry to pull images from. if not set, the ImageRepository defined in ClusterConfiguration will be used instead.

imageTag.description: ImageTag allows to specify a tag for the image. In case this value is set, kubeadm does not change automatically the version of the above components during upgrades.
